verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> unto all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3967>them<s%>, I am an hundred and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>; I <S%H3201>can<s%> no more go <S%H3318>out<s%> and come <S%H935>in<s%>: also the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5674>me<s%>, You shall not go over this <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, he will go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8045>you<s%>, and he will destroy these <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3423>you<s%>, and you shall possess <S%H3091>them<s%>: and Joshua, he shall go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>you<s%>, as the Lord has <S%H1696>said<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them as he <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and to <S%H5747>Og<s%>, <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8045>them<s%>, whom he destroyed.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall give them <S%H5414>up<s%> before your <S%H6440>face<s%>, that you may <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them according unto all the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I have commanded <S%H6680>you<s%>.

Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of a good <S%H553>courage<s%>, <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H6206>not<s%>, nor be afraid of <S%H6440>them<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, he it is that does <S%H1980>go<s%> with <S%H7503>you<s%>; he will not fail <S%H5800>you<s%>, nor forsake you.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of a good <S%H553>courage<s%>: for you must <S%H935>go<s%> with this <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5157>them<s%>; and you shall cause them to inherit it.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, he it is that does <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7503>you<s%>; he will be with you, he will not fail <S%H5800>you<s%>, neither forsake <S%H3372>you<s%>: fear <S%H2865>not<s%>, neither be dismayed.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> this <S%H8451>law<s%>, and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it unto the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, which <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and unto all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, At the <S%H7093>end<s%> of every <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, in the <S%H4150>solemnity<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H8059>release<s%>, in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%>,

When all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which he shall <S%H977>choose<s%>, you shall <S%H7121>read<s%> this <S%H8451>law<s%> before all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in their <S%H241>hearing<s%>.

<S%H6950>Gather<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6950>together<s%>, <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H802>women<s%>, and <S%H2945>sons<s%>, and your <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is inside your <S%H8179>gates<s%>, that they may <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and that they may <S%H3925>learn<s%>, and <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%>:

And that their <S%H1121>sons<s%>, which have not <S%H3045>known<s%> any <S%H8085>thing<s%>, may hear, and <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, as long <S%H3117>as<s%> you <S%H2416>live<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> where you go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3117>Behold<s%>, your days <S%H7126>approach<s%> that you must <S%H4191>die<s%>: <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and <S%H3320>present<s%> yourselves in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, that I may give him a <S%H6680>charge<s%>. And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%>, and <S%H3320>presented<s%> themselves in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of a <S%H6051>cloud<s%>: and the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> over the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H7901>Behold<s%>, you shall sleep with your <S%H1>fathers<s%>; and this <S%H5971>people<s%> will rise <S%H6965>up<s%>, and go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5236>strangers<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, where they <S%H935>go<s%> to be <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H5800>them<s%>, and will forsake <S%H6565>me<s%>, and break my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which I have made with <S%H3772>them<s%>.

Then my <S%H639>anger<s%> shall be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against them in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, and I will <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H5641>them<s%>, and I will hide my <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H398>them<s%>, and they shall be devoured, and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7451>evils<s%> and <S%H6869>troubles<s%> shall happen <S%H4672>to<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>; so that they will say in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, Are not these <S%H7451>evils<s%> <S%H4672>come<s%> upon <S%H430>us<s%>, because our God is not among <S%H7130>us<s%>?

And I will <S%H5641>surely<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> for all the <S%H7451>evils<s%> which they shall have <S%H6213>worked<s%>, in <S%H3588>that<s%> they are <S%H6437>turned<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H3789>write<s%> you this <S%H7892>song<s%> for <S%H3925>you<s%>, and teach it the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H7760>put<s%> it in their <S%H6310>mouths<s%>, that this <S%H7892>song<s%> may be a <S%H5707>witness<s%> for me against the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For when I shall have <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H127>land<s%> which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, that <S%H2100>flows<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>; and they shall have <S%H398>eaten<s%> and <S%H7646>filled<s%> <S%H1878>themselves<s%>, and grown fat; then will they <S%H6437>turn<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5006>them<s%>, and provoke <S%H6565>me<s%>, and break my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H7227>pass<s%>, when many <S%H7451>evils<s%> and <S%H6869>troubles<s%> are <S%H4672>happened<s%> <S%H7892>them<s%>, that this song shall <S%H6030>testify<s%> <S%H6440>against<s%> them as a <S%H5707>witness<s%>; for it shall not be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> out of the <S%H6310>mouths<s%> of their <S%H2233>seed<s%>: for I <S%H3045>know<s%> their <S%H3336>imagination<s%> which they go <S%H6213>about<s%>, even <S%H3117>now<s%>, before I have <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H7650>swore<s%>.
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> therefore <S%H3789>wrote<s%> this <S%H7892>song<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H3925>taught<s%> it the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And he gave <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> a <S%H6680>charge<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of a good <S%H553>courage<s%>: for you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I swore unto <S%H7650>them<s%>: and I will be with you.

And it came to <S%H4872>pass<s%>, when Moses had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H3789>writing<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%>, until they were <S%H8552>finished<s%>,
That <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, which <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H3947>Take<s%> this <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> it by the <S%H6654>side<s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, that it may be there for a witness against <S%H5707>you<s%>.

For I <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H4805>rebellion<s%>, and your <S%H7186>stiff<s%> <S%H6203>neck<s%>: <S%H2416>behold<s%>, while I am yet alive with you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, you have been <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and how much more <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H4194>death<s%>?

<S%H6950>Gather<s%> unto me all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, and your <S%H7860>officers<s%>, that I may <S%H1696>speak<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> in their <S%H241>ears<s%>, and <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> to record against <S%H5749>them<s%>.

For I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H4194>death<s%> you will <S%H7843>utterly<s%> <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H5493>yourselves<s%>, and turn aside from the <S%H1870>way<s%> which I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H7451>you<s%>; and evil will happen <S%H7122>to<s%> you in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; because you will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> through the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of all the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H7892>song<s%>, until they were <S%H8552>ended<s%>.
